title: 'Good'
body: Comfort: Probably the most comfortable shoes I've owned. Extremely soft. Support: Kind of weak, they don't have much structure and I tend to overpronate. Not much structure at the toe so you can see toes through.

title: 'Worth for money Rs 500'
column5: I bought this shoes in Oct 2022 at price of Rs 500 and I am surprised that I am still using ths in Oct. 2023. But now the condition of the shoes is getting bad day by day. So you can consider this shoes for short term use like for 1 year at price range of 500-700Rs. Otherwise I will suggest to go for another higher value models.'

title: 'Quality'
body: Product is comfortable 4/5. Recieved it in perfect condition from Amazon 5/5. Quality is thing where the company needs to work in this price range too so for me quality is 3/5. Look of the product is decent and can be used with formal attire. Rest about durability can't say much right now because just wore it twice so may be will be able to tell after few months about it.
